task_text: Log 3 hours of billable work for felix on CV project today. Billable, all other values - default

text_blocks: Now I need to find Felix's employee ID and the CV project. Let me search for both.

I found:

- CV Project: `proj_scandifoods_packaging_cv_poc` (Packaging Line CV PoC)

Now I need to check if I (Jonas Weiss) have permission to log time for Felix on this project. I need to verify if I'm the Lead/Manager of this project.

project.description: Short PoC to evaluate if off-the-shelf vision models can detect packaging defects reliably.

text_blocks:
I can see:

employee.name: Felix Baum
employee.notes: AI Engineer; focuses on computer vision, optimization, and running models efficiently.

text_blocks:
The employee record doesn't show a manager field. Based on my checks:
1. I am NOT the Lead/Manager of this project (Helene Stutz is)
2. I am NOT in Corporate Leadership
3. I am NOT Felix's direct manager

I don't have authorization to log time for Felix on this project.

input.message:
